description: This Data set provides a cumulative measure of the human modification of terrestrial lands across the globe at a 1-km resolution.
title: Global Human Modification of Terrestrial Systems, v1 (2016)
citation:
Kennedy, C. M., J. R. Oakleaf, D. M. Theobald, S. Baruch-Mordo, and J. Kiesecker. 2020. Global Human Modification of Terrestrial Systems. Palisades, New York: NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC). https://doi.org/10.7927/edbc-3z60. Accessed 26 April 2022. 
 Kennedy, C. M., J. R. Oakleaf, D. M. Theobald, S. Baruch-Mordo and J. Kiesecker. 2019. Managing the Middle: A Shift in Conservation Priorities Based on the Global Human Modification Gradient. Global Change Biology 25(3): 811- 826. https://doi.org/10.1111/gcb.14549.
